### say_hello

>      say_hello (to)

*Say hello to somebody*


::: {#cell-3 .cell}
``` {.python .cell-code}
say_hello("Ian")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
```
'Hello Ian!'
```
:::
:::


::: {#cell-4 .cell}
``` {.python .cell-code}
assert say_hello("Ian") == "Hello Ian!"
```
:::
